ygData.subject: Re: Permafrost?
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/29/99 5:58:59 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... strategy ... I can tell you that the patch says they changed permafrost... and from the sounds
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/29/99 5:58:59 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
sidney_earley@... writes:

> I have heard some people claiming they've had great success in Permafrost
> with groups in the 15-22 level range. Does anyone out there have any
> experiences in Permafrost they would like to share that either confirm or
> contradict this claim. If confirming, could you please describe the
strategy
> used for a group in the 15-22 level range?

I can tell you that the patch says they changed permafrost... and from the
sounds of it upped the critters... so that range may no longer be good.

I am 22, and was fighting blues and greens for a while (goblins, and goblin
casters (clerics and enchanters) and moved to an area where there were some
white/black and yellows. But that is BEFORE the patch.

You DO need a group, because they tend to swarm.

Sonoroud Tomebinder.
